title: Provides that fiscal notes shall include a statement about any person who pays someone to provide a fiscal note to the legislature
summary: Provides that fiscal notes shall include a statement about any person who pays someone to provide a fiscal note to the legislature.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2581

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GABRYSZAK, CASTRO, GALEF -- Multi-Sponsored by --
         M.  of A. BARCLAY, CALHOUN, MAYERSOHN, McKEVITT, MOLINARO -- read once
         and referred to the Committee on Governmental Operations

       AN ACT to amend the legislative law,  in  relation  to  individuals  who
         provide fiscal impact statements to the legislature

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 50 of the legislative law, as added by chapter  503
    2  of the laws of 1971, is amended to read as follows:
    3    S 50. Fiscal  note  in retirement bills. A bill which enacts or amends
    4  any provision of law relating to a retirement  system  or  plan  of  the
    5  state  of New York or of any of its political subdivisions shall contain
    6  a fiscal note stating the estimated annual cost to the employer affected
    7  [and], the source of such estimate AND A STATEMENT IDENTIFYING THE INDI-
    8  VIDUAL OR ENTITY THAT PROVIDED COMPENSATION TO THE SOURCE OF SUCH  ESTI-
    9  MATE, IF ANY.
   10    S  2.  Section  51  of  the legislative law is amended by adding a new
   11  subdivision 5 to read as follows:
   12    5. FISCAL NOTES SHALL STATE THE ESTIMATED ANNUAL COST TO THE POLITICAL
   13  SUBDIVISION, THE SOURCE OF SUCH ESTIMATE, AND  A  STATEMENT  IDENTIFYING
   14  THE  INDIVIDUAL  OR  ENTITY  THAT PROVIDED COMPENSATION TO THE SOURCE OF
   15  SUCH ESTIMATE, IF ANY.
   16    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07637-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to individuals who provide fiscal impact statements to the legislature
